product_name: Polar WearLink+ Transmitter Nike+ Heart Rate Strap
long_description: The Polar WearLink+ Transmitter Nike+ heart rate strap allows you to transmit heart rate data to your Nike+ system, Polar training computer or gym cardio equipment (all sold separately). Compatible with Nike+ Sportband, Nike+ SportWatch GPS fitness monitor, and iPod Nano 5th generation (used in conjuction with the Nike+ iPod Sport kit). Compatible with Polar training watches utilizing 5kHz coded transmission, including FT1, FT2, FT4, FT7, FT40, FT60, FT80, RS100, RS300X, RS400, CS100, CS200, CS300 and CS400. Wear the strap around your chest to transmit your heart rate wirelessly to your iPod Nano (used with Nike+ iPod Sport kit) or Nike+ Sportband or Sportwatch (sold separately). You will see your beats per min. on your Nike+ Sportband or SportWatch, or hear spoken feedback on your iPod Nano with Nike+ iPod Sport kit. Heart rate data can be transferred to the nikeplus.com website where you can analyze your workouts. Not compatible with Polar RS800CX, CS500 and CS600X because they utilize 2.4gHz W.I.N.D. transmission technology. Nike+ Sportband, Nike+ iPod Sport kit, Apple iPod Nano and Polar training watches all sold separately. Includes Polar WearLink+ strap, WearLink+ transmitter Nike+ and user manual.
short_description: The Polar WearLink+ Transmitter Nike+ heart rate strap allows you to transmit heart rate data to your Nike+ system, Polar training computer or gym cardio equipment (all sold separately).
